objects.text:
• Flexible, breathable upper construction
• TPU TRUSSTIC for improved stability
• Enhanced grip for quick transitions

product_details.name: Asics GEL-ROCKET 11 mens INDOOR SPORT SHOES
product_details.description: ASICS GEL-ROCKET 11 style is a multi-purpose indoor court shoe that offers good stability and easy movement for a range of court athletes. This shoe is designed with a flexible upper construction that's breathable and more comfortable. A TPU TRUSSTIC application in the midsole is designed to help resist over-twisting and improve stability during quick transitions. Its wrap-up outsole and outrigger are functional support components that are helpful during side-to-side movements. Meanwhile, the outsole's flexion gro

banner_details:
This banner showcases a premium athletic shoe using a clean and structured layout divided vertically into two sections. The left side features a dark diagonal-striped black and gray gradient background with minimalistic gold diamond patterns. It contains multiple text layers, including a prominent bold heading (`heading`), a highlighted subheading (`subheading`) in gold, a concise bullet list of features (`description`) in white, a bold price point (`price`) in gold, and a gold call-to-action button (`cta_background`) with black "SHOP NOW" text (`cta`). The right panel has a light gray background with the product image (`product_image`) prominently placed. 

**Color Palette**:
- Jet Black: #1A1A1A
- Gunmetal Gray: #2D2D2D
- Gold: #D4AF37
- Light Gold: #FFD700
- White: #FFFFFF
- Light Gray: #F0F0F0
product_color: The product image features a dynamic and bold color scheme centered around black and metallic gold tones. The base of the shoe is matte black (#121212), providing a sleek and powerful foundation. Metallic gold (#D4AF37) is prominently used in the brand’s logo and heel area, adding contrast and a premium, eye-catching effect. Subtle accents of white (#EDEDED) outline the logo to enhance visibility, while hints of dark silver-gray (#7A7A7A) in the lace area add depth. This color palette blends richness and sophistication, ideal for an advertisement banner with themes of energy, performance, and luxury.
